channel.title: Deep Learning Indaba𝕏 South Africa
channel.description: Recent content on Deep Learning Indaba𝕏 South Africa

item.title: Register now 📝
item.description: We welcome students, academics, and industry professionals to attend the Deep Learning Indaba𝕏 South Africa - one of South Africa’s premier Machine Learning gatherings and community-building spaces 🤝.

item.title: AI Fest 🖼️
item.description:
We welcome one and all to the most awaited 🎤 AI FEST 🖼️

If you would like to register just for the AI Fest, use the link below ↓

item.title: Submit abstract for talks and posters
item.description:
We welcome submitted talks 🎤 and posters 🖼️ !

Abstract submissions are open but will be closing on 16th June.

item.title: Tips for a successful application 💡
item.description: Demonstrate your willingness to engage with others: Conferences are a great opportunity to network and learn from others in your field.

item.title: Travel grants
item.description: We have some travel grants available for South African students which must be applied for during the application process.

item.title: Join the Indaba𝕏 2023 organising committee
item.description: Define the path of the Indaba𝕏 South Africa in 2023! We are looking for the next generation of ML community leaders in South Africa!
About 300+ attendees - connect with other researchers and practitioners

item.title: Payment cancelled
item.description: If you meant to cancel, no hard feelings, we hope to see you at another event soon.

item.title: Thank you
item.description: We are super excited to see you at the event!

item.title: Join the Indaba𝕏 2022 organising committee
item.description: We are looking for the next generation of ML community leaders in South Africa!

item.title: Team Roles and Responsibilities
item.description: We are here to grow the community 🤝
About The Indaba𝕏 2021 will be held in the form of a Roadshow.
In consideration of public safety around the ongoing covid-19 pandemic, we have decided to cancel the physical #DLXSA2020 event.

item.title: Code of conduct
item.description: The purpose of this code of conduct is to create a safe, conducive environment for everyone to have a positive experience.
